actions.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment increases funding for the National Guard Starbase program by $2 million.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 7 in the Congressional Record of July 28, 1997, to increase funding for the National Guard Starbase program by $2 million. Funding for the increase would be offset by reducing funds comensurately from the NATO Joint Stars program.
